name: Unblock It - Free Block From Jam Board Games
name_original: Unblock It - Free Block From Jam Board Games
description:
Unblock It Free is a simple and addictive puzzle game. The goal is to get the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way.

FEATURES:
+ different difficult levels ranging from Beginner to Expert
+ Keep track of all the puzzles you've cleared
+ Hint system that will guide you through the puzzle
+ Undo system
